title: Canada Apostille Services in Delhi NCR
description:
Planning to move to Canada for higher education, work, permanent residency, or business expansion? As of 2024, Canada accepts apostilled documents, making the legalization process simpler, faster, and more efficient. Whether you're applying for a Canada student visa, work permit, or PR process, your Indian documents must be apostilled through the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA), Government of India.
Our Canada apostille services in Delhi NCR cover personal, educational, and commercial documents — including birth certificate apostille for Canada, degree certificate apostille, and marriage certificate apostille. If you’ve been searching for apostille for Canada in Delhi, or need Canada apostille near me, our expert service ensures everything is taken care of from start to finish.
We specialize in assisting with MEA apostille for Canada, document authentication for IRCC, and preparing documents for Canadian universities, employers, and immigration consultants. Trust our team to deliver prompt, verified apostille solutions with doorstep pickup and delivery in Delhi NCR.
requirements: Free document pickup & delivery across Delhi NCR
Apostille for all types of documents—personal, educational, and commercial
process: MEA Apostille by Govt. of India
note: Canada now accepts apostille from MEA India; no embassy attestation is required.
documentsRequired: Birth certificates, Marriage certificates, Divorce Decree, Affidavits, etc
Degree certificate, Diploma certificate, Marksheet, etc
Power of Attorney, Certificate of Incorporation, Agreements, etc
